attributes.action: swiftly improve the state of railway stations in Greater Manchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many of the railway stations in Greater Manchester e.g. Deansgate, Oxford Road etc are currently in a rather unwelcoming state that discourages commuters from using the rail network. We encourage this Government, in particular the DfT, to allocate funding for the improvement of railway stations and facilities in the Greater Manchester and Salford area, particularly within the stations mentioned above, as well as improves signage, to ensure that more commuters use the network and stimulatethe local economy, particularly after the TIF defeat last December.
